level.heading: Participation of District agencies.
level.text: All departments and agencies of the District of Columbia government are hereby directed to provide full participation and cooperation in the implementation of this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 47-2801.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Short title of title II of D.C. Law 12-261: Section 2001 of D.C. Law 12-261 provided that title II of the act may be cited as the Business Regulatory Reform Act of 1998.
